location: Minsheng W. Rd., Datong District, near Shuanglian MRT Station and Ningxia Night Market
notes: 2BR/2BA elevator apartment on 5F/13F, described as 'excellent condition' with 90% furnishings included. Well-located near Shuanglian MRT (406m) and Ningxia Night Market. Has 2 balconies which may need baby-proofing for railing safety; described as 'mid-range decoration' so likely not fully modern but maintained. NT$50k rent plus NT$4k management fee and 2-month deposit; no pets allowed. Good natural light potential with north-south dual orientation.
